verse: Who is wise enough to understand this? To whom has the mouth of the Lord spoken? Let him declare it!
The Lord said: Because they have abandoned my law, which I set before them, and did not listen to me or follow it,
but followed instead their stubborn hearts and the Baals, as their ancestors had taught them,
therefore, thus says the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel: See now, I will give this people wormwood to eat and poisoned water to drink.
I will scatter them among nations whom neither they nor their ancestors have known; I will send the sword to pursue them until I have completely destroyed them.
False Circumcision. See, days are coming—oracle of the Lord—when I will demand an account of all those circumcised in the foreskin:

Egypt and Judah, Edom and the Ammonites, Moab, and those who live in the wilderness and shave their temples. For all the nations are uncircumcised, even the whole house of Israel is uncircumcised at heart.
